entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 3 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then clearing. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 3 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
